messages.message: i’m trying to login with requests.post (http://requests.post), grab the cookies, and then use it for future requests. I dont seem to be getting the cookies back though — does any one know what I’m doing wrong in the get_cookies() method? https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/12166/files — cc: @Aaron Vontell @shaunak — who might have tried this before. If anyone knows that’d be great

boom! got it to work fyi @Chetan — basically you have to turn off auto_redirects in the requests.post (http://requests.post) so you can capture the cookies which can be used for future automation: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/12166
ooo nice :thumbsup: thx for the heads up @dlluncor
